description:
Nugan is the brother of http://anidb.net/ch16878 [Shunan], and the second son of the http://anidb.net/ch16880 [Grand Duke].
Nugan has a great respect for his brother, but later feels betrayed by him, partly because of the machinations of the http://anidb.net/ch16877 [Queen]`s nephew, http://anidb.net/ch16875 [Damiya]. He believes that the country is as it should be: the Queen ruling it and the Grand Duke protecting it.
name: Nugan
